captions.text: Today, we’re going on a boat trip..
The boat will be leaving for Weh island from aceh
There’s a city called sabang in weh island
It’s the western most part of Indonesia
If you went a little bit further you’ll end up in indian ocean
And he island we’re packed with mysteries
Why? cos I have no idea what’s in there…
Why I’m here and why I’m bound to weh
was because yesterday I found a shell and it whispered to me
What’s up shell??
Jebraw you have to go to an island where the folks were laid back
And there’s a forest which guarded by a boar
And there’s a treasure of which can be used to raise your traveler status
From your true traveler status into super true traveler
Anybody seen jebraw?
Where did he go?
Where’s jebraw?
Let’s go epic team! we’re gonna hunt for the treasure up ahead
Oh my God..that’s jebraw!
We have to save him!
We’ve arrived at Bebas Sabang port
I found a clue!
I found a clue at the bottom of the sea
Jebraw really went to the max!
The folks really are laid back
I bet when you arrived here, you’re gonna go straight for a swim
We found a cellphone number!
Jalan jalan men!
Whose number is this?
It’s so mysterious…
Braw.. the next clue on the treasure was written on the wall of the late Japanese bunker
I have to go to the Japanese bunker!
To avoid hassle, I asked the locals where are the bunkers
Turns out, the man tells us interesting stories behind weh island
When the army and GAM clashing about, they cease fire in the end…
There are no firefight between TNI and GAM..
They often meet and hangout casually
And that’s where “sabang” where derived from..”santai banget”
Woow sabang! santai banget man!
And Mr. Adri surely knows about where was the bunker located
I ask him to help us
Please take us there
Sure..
I’m gonna take you there.. i’ll show you where it is…
And we’re gonna have some fun
Is there any traffic?
There’s never any traffic and there are no bandits along the way
Being the exceptionally laid back city, sabang was known for an international visits
See for yourself..
There’s a really huge boat man!
And so, the folks were really open to everyone
But the most awesome fact about sabang
That this land was actually a living coral!
So right know we’re standing on the live coral!
Which never stops to grow
The road often breaks
Because roots and rocks often erects itself from the grounds
Amazing!
I love you coral
It’s alive…
There’s a hidden stairs
Let’s go there!
Because the Japanese bunker is there!
This bunker was built when world war 2 happens
To this day, the bunker still stands…it’s very sturdy
Despite there’s no one to take care of them
You can see that there’s a crude writings on the wall
Including the person whom gave me the clue..
What the hell man?!
You’re giving me the clue while ruining it at the same time!
I succeed taking over the Japanese bunker!
This is Japanese bunker
It’s very laid back
Like if there was a boat coming around
They started shooting at it
And then they just resuming kickin their boots
This is a cannon
A laid back one…
Cos it’s only for sitting purpose only, hence sabang.. santai banget
Time to look for another clue
And it should be around here somewhere between all of these writings
Andika *censored* right here
Come here man!
"Traveler sejati harus ke santai.."
Or has to be laid back?
Braw!
Just now, I’ve been told that
“santai” is actually a place
We’re going to santai
In that case let’s chill!
Come up here… grab it!
One..two..three
Santai…
Jalan jalan men!
This is is!
Santai sumur tiga!
this is called pantai santai
therefore I’m just gonna chill
wooww…the water is so crystal clear blue
even the food stalls are along the coast
you gotta walk down the path and go straight up ahead
you gotta have you fill before treasure hunting
maybe you thought that the food was typical
but turns out the food were no less awesome than Italians
woow… locals folks know how to make pizza
braw.. try it..
wooww.. what’s this.. looks like some sort of code
go deep…
it came to me by itself!
I had to go deep…
Looks like we’re going across the island
And I had to go deep
We’re bound to the lodging
Where we can go straight for snorkel
Whoaaa. .there’s a stick… what’s this for?
Treasure!
I will find that treasure!
I’m cool right..?
Like a super traveler
So we’re here…
Iboh inn… where we gonna stay and look for a treasure
Nay help me…
Say it…
No can do..
I have to snorkling!
To hunt my treasure
If you went for snorkeling don’t forget your camera
Technically it’s your eyes when your inside the water
And do narcissistic things…
It’s not deep enough..
There’s only rock… rock..
Awesome fishes
Starfish!
But no treasures!!
I’m not giving up!
I know.. i’m not chill enough
You had to relax to clear your mind
One of the important things when traveling
Is to make new friends
Look for other traveler..
Who knows they can share their knowledge with us
And learn from them what we don’t know
And in the end, your trip was educational
There’s one more thing about this island
Where you can’t get it anywhere else
The sky…
Wanna see? here goes…
Wooww!!!
Totally awesome!
Jalan jalan men!
Last night my new friends told me
If I wanted to go deep.. then I had to go diving
If it’s treasure, it’s deep
He knows where it is!
There’s one more important things to do before we go diving
Do I need a license?
Certainly
So I need the license?
Yes
I have to go practice first?
Yes.
Okay!
That’s GBK!
Okay..we’ver arrived at senayan!
I descend from the sky to dive
Where we can embark on adventures
Yo braw!
How did you get here?
I teleported
Wow!! teleportation!!
Before diving we have to prepare first
We have to earn the license
(inaudible)
If not, you’re gonna die instead dive…
Here.. not only theory but there’s also practical exercise
The awesome thing is we had to change into cool attire
Like hi-tech gizmo.. iron man kinda thing
There’s so much I learned from diving
The most important things when learned to dive was
Jalan jalan men!
So diving is essentially a teamwork sport
Jalan jalan men!
This is my treasure island!
I’m sure my treasure is somewhere in there
Wooww.. may people said that Indonesia is the best place to go diving
And I know why now…
Look at these..
The car’s carcases was used to to create artificial reefs
Nemo… dori…
This is so beautiful
The first thing that pops into my mind was
This whole things was like an gigantic aquarium
And the fishes were scaled large and we’re inside of it
When you want to understands the beauty of Indonesia you have to go deep
And in the end, you will understands the beauty of it
Arrgrgh.. I still cannot find the next clue!
God give me a sign
Ooh that’s right..!
If you’re looking for direction inside the water
You have to follow the fish
They know the water currents
It’s like underwater taxi!
So I’m hitching a ride with the fishes
Pe- to the – cah!
There’s a clue inside the bottle
I have to celebrate this moment
I made it!
I found the next clue!
I know!
I have to go to zero kilometer!
In order to become a true super traveler!
I feel like I’m the end of my quest…
That everything will return to zero
I had a feeling that this is only the beginning
There’s a cool boar called bro!
I’m like.. so near with my treasure
Look at this boar
She was called “si bro”
You’re so awesome man!
Wow.. what’s that!?
Tugu kilometer nol
Tugu kilometer nol
Nol! Nol!
I love you so much!
Why are you here?
Who do you think gave you all of those clues?
So all of this time?
Yes.. that’s right braw!
All of those clues are from me!
Cool right?
Cos last time you gave my treasure
And now it’s my turn to return the favor
Congrats! you’re on the edge of Indonesia
And you have became…
I have become a super true traveler
And now I’m going to sing..
If the weathers were clear
We can see Bangladesh from here with naked eyes
India, Srilangka, Maldives, Mauritius…
Further up ahead… take right turn, turn left and there’s Europe
Jalan jalan men!
